summary: Web app with reminders/timers; user wants interval configuration updates and to publish the site.

existing_features.title: Update the Interval Timer configuration UI to include a minutes input section for Interval A and Interval B (in addition to seconds), so users can set intervals using minutes+seconds while the timer continues to run using total seconds internally.

Adjust Interval Timer validation limits to support minute-based entry (e.g., allow intervals longer than the current 600-second cap) and ensure clamping/validation remains consistent for both minutes and seconds fields.

Improve the in-app publishing guidance so the user can reliably “publish my website” from the existing Publish & Share sheet, including clearer copy for draft/preview vs public URL and a short checklist of the steps to go live.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a minute section to the interval configuration (support minute-based interval input).
Publish the website (move deployed draft to a public/production release).

projectName: Add minutes input for Interval Timer and improve publishing flow
